product_name: Brooks Infiniti A/B Sports Bra - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Brooks Infiniti A/B sports bra offers full support without bulk or unnecessary weight and stays snug while running or doing other high-impact activities. Combination of compression and encapsulation support provides a secure fit that hugs without being uncomfortable. Elastic chest band features soft, ribbed fabric that manages moisture and won't irritate skin. Adjustable racer-back straps let you personalize your fit. Seam-free, shaped cups provide subtle lift and contouring. Mesh panels and inner liner wick moisture away from the skin, ensuring you stay dry and comfortable even when working up a sweat. Closeout.
short_description: The Brooks Infiniti A/B sports bra offers full support without bulk or unnecessary weight and stays snug while running or doing other high-impact activities.
